title: Old Skool LED
summary: Set your Geek free with this fun scroller from the 90's Watch Face
description: A Unique and fun watch face, with an Old School Style, take yourself back to the old Amiga Demo Scene days with a scrolly watch face, select from one static and four animated scolly effects, this is not an animated gif, but a full blown animated scroller..Ambient face will show stationary scroll text.Enjoy Old Skool Style and set your Geek free,,,,Configuration options.★ Style of Watch, Choose from Normal,Ripple,Sine Wave 1,Sine Wave 2, Rotate and Change every 5 minutes.★ Change Color of active Ball★ Change Color of non-active Ball★ Change Color of Background★ Change Color of Date and Battery★ Change brightness of ambient mode★ Change 12/24 hour modeYou can select background color and non-active ball color to the same so it will not show up.If you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.To install please refer to the Wear Support Page.https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6140435Is compatible with Android Wear 5+ devicesIf you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.Please note, settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet.
descriptionHTML:
A Unique and fun watch face, with an Old School Style, take yourself back to the old Amiga Demo Scene days with a scrolly watch face, select from one static and four animated scolly effects, this is not an animated gif, but a full blown animated scroller..
Ambient face will show stationary scroll text.

Enjoy Old Skool Style and set your Geek free,,,,

Configuration options.
★ Style of Watch, Choose from Normal,Ripple,Sine Wave 1,Sine Wave 2, Rotate and Change every 5 minutes.
★ Change Color of active Ball
★ Change Color of non-active Ball
★ Change Color of Background
★ Change Color of Date and Battery
★ Change brightness of ambient mode
★ Change 12/24 hour mode

You can select background color and non-active ball color to the same so it will not show up.

If you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.

To install please refer to the Wear Support Page.
https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6140435

Is compatible with Android Wear 5+ devices

If you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.

Please note, settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet.
comments: Great, but... This is great, however, I really don't like the ambient mode.  I think it would look so much better and be easier to read by getting rid of the background dots and just showing the time.
Great looking watchface Really responsive developers. It looks great on my watch, lots of customization settings. Lots of potential.
Very clever Not just the same boring watchface, it's like a mini C64 demo on your wrist
recentChanges: Version 6 Update - Clean up of the config screen. tweaked for better battery life.
